name: Pizza Pirate Pratt: Plunder, Pillage, Pepperoni
name_original: Pizza Pirate Pratt: Plunder, Pillage, Pepperoni
description:
Sail the seven seas as famous Pizza Pirate Charles Pratt.

Sink the scallywags before they board you. And claim all the pepperoni

Credits: Mostafa Haque. Charlie Hattabaugh
